ValidationRule.description: Created as a part of SDT-40723 to prevent users from changing status of task if status is open
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status , 'Open')) && ISPICKVAL( Sys_Created_From__c , 'Created from PE Trigger') && Description !='Vendor Commit Date has been updated to today or future date.'
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot change status of Task. Please update the Vendor Commit Date on Quote Line to complete the Task.
